key.name: background-color
key.description: The Background color of the icon view.

key.name: use-background-color
key.description: If True, the icon view will use the specified background-color instead of the gtk theme color.

key.name: zoom-value
key.description: Zoom factor for the thumbnails.

key.name: window-width
key.description: Saved width of the main window

key.name: window-height
key.description: Saved height of the main window

key.name: window-maximized
key.description: Save state of the main window

key.name: display-statusbar
key.description: Whether the statusbar should be displayed.

key.name: display-toolbar
key.description: Whether the toolbar should be displayed.
